KillerOverride.Name: The Shape
KillerOverride.KillerNotes: The Shape has ZERO perk bans or restrictions (individual or combined). This overrides General Balancing (Ex: NOED + NWO can be used; PWYF, Hubris can be used; etc.). However, the “NOED Rule” still applies.

KillerOverride.Name: The Lich
KillerOverride.KillerNotes: Survivors CANNOT open The Lich’s unique chests. If a survivor is caught doing this, the offending team will suffer the same penalty as opening a normal chest. Picking up a chest item results in a set forfeit.
